How to Play
The goal of the game is to get the highest score possible using 100 coins by buying three different chests; a common chest, a rare chest, or a legendary chest. Each chest has a different drop rate for one of the five possible rewards: nothing, a bronze coin, a silver coin, a gold coin, and a diamond gem.
